title: I just renewed my windows and when I was finished I downloaded LoL But it does not open
body:
I reinstalled Windows just to make my league of legends run better but it seams to brake it i really need help pleas 

i really want to play my favourite champs again {{champion:268}}

replies.body:
I fount the problem I had to launch it as Admin

But now i have a problem with the logs

I tried to start it now but all that comes up is the League of Legends logo and then puff it dissapiers
 pleas help.

It sounds like you've got a series of different issues causing some trouble, but I'd like to help you get back in the game.  First of all, it sounds like your Windows setting is blocking the patcher from opening.  As a first step, our permissions guide can help give the patcher access to launch and scan game files.

Once that part is resolved, the bugsplat may indicate an issue with outdated drivers or something else that's poorly rendering the game.  For this, our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide will go over a series of steps to get this resolved.  I hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=27b31ece,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-08-06T15:58:49.942+0000)
>
> It sounds like you've got a series of different issues causing some trouble, but I'd like to help you get back in the game.  First of all, it sounds like your Windows setting is blocking the patcher from opening.  As a first step, our permissions guide can help give the patcher access to launch and scan game files.
> 
> Once that part is resolved, the bugsplat may indicate an issue with outdated drivers or something else that's poorly rendering the game.  For this, our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide will go over a series of steps to get this resolved.  I hope that helps!

Sorry to say but I tried everything but nothing help

Pleas Help

Regards
